panels.description: This panels displays average read/write latency in microseconds for all operations on the LUN.
panels.title: Latency

panels.description: This panel displays Read/Write bytes data.
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: This panel displays number of read/write operations.
panels.title: IOPs

panels.description: This panel displays detail of I/O to or from a LUN which is not owned by the storage system handling the I/O and number of operations received by a storage system that does not own the LUN targeted by the operations.
panels.title: Indirect Access

panels.description: This panel displays detail of number of compare and write requests, number of unmap command requests, number of write same command requests, number of write same commands requests with unmap bit set and total number of xcopy operations on the LUN.
panels.title: vStorage Offload Operations
